title: More informative Check annotation on public API change
body:
Look at https://github.com/microsoft/msbuild/pull/4814/checks?check_run_id=260937103:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3347530/66849212-23403f00-ef3c-11e9-9b5c-e5dffcebb4b2.png)

This is almost helpful, but it could be dramatically more helpful if it used the Checks API to actually annotate the diff in the file.
